net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.tools

Class Indexor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.tools.Indexor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashingIndexor

    public class Indexor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Indexor (yes, I know the hashFunctionsFileName sounds weird, but it should match the Extractor class, and not the Lucene Indexing classes) reads data files created by the Extractor. They are added to a given index. Note that the index is not overwritten, but the documents are appended.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at Date: 08.03.13 Time: 14:28
